verbs.description: [V: hash] [ARG1: brown broccoli] bake here a perfect dish for a potluck or holiday buffet it goes well with fish poultry pork or beef cheddar cheese can be substituted for swiss often i double the recipe to serve a crowd —jeanette volker walton nebraska
